Title: Pilot (2)
Plot: Bette Porter and Tina Kennard have been a couple for seven years, and they want to start a family. Their next-door neighbor, Tim Haspel, is excited that his girlfriend, a talented young writer named Jenny Schecter, is moving in with him. But soon mixing with Bette and Tina's circle of lesbian friends, Jenny learns that her midwest university education may not have prepared her for what she will learn about life, lust, and love in Los Angeles.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Ali Liebert,  Tony Alcantar,  Michael Benyaer,  Sarah Cole-Burnett,  Woody Jeffreys,  Luciana Carro,  Rekha Sharma,  Peter Shinkoda,  Stephen Park,  Jennifer Copping,  Ari Cohen,  Tammy Lynn Michaels,  Guinevere
